info.kwarc.krextor
Class Krextor

java.lang.Object
  info.kwarc.krextor.Krextor

public class Krextor
extends Object

A Java wrapper for the Krextor XMLâ†’RDF extraction library, which is implemented in XSLT. Uses the Saxon XSLT processor. Part of this implementation is based on the at.srfg.ikewiki.importer.RXRReader class developed by Sebastian Schaffert for IkeWiki, which has been released under GPL.

Author:
Christoph Lange

Constructor Detail

Method Detail

generateStylesheet

public Document generateStylesheet(String inputFormat,
                                   String outputFormat)
                            throws ParserConfigurationException
Generates a Krextor XSLT stylesheet for extracting RDF from a certain input format and returning the extracted RDF in a certain output format (i.e. a RDF notation). The stylesheet is generated on the fly.

Parameters:
inputFormat - the name of the input format, as it is known to Krextor (an XSLT file in the extract/ directory)
outputFormat - the name of the output format, as it is known to Krextor (an XSLT file in the output/ directory)
Returns:
a XOM representation of an XSLT stylesheet that bundles together the desired extraction and output modules of Krextor
Throws:
ParserConfigurationException

getTransformerName

public static String getTransformerName(String inputFormat,
                                        String outputFormat)
returns a filename suitable for an XSLT that transforms from an input format (XML) to an output format (RDF notation)

Parameters:
inputFormat - the name of the input format
outputFormat - the name of the output format
Returns:
the filename

getTransformer

public Document getTransformer(String inputFormat,
                               String outputFormat)
Generates a Krextor XSLT stylesheet for extracting RDF from a certain input format and returning the extracted RDF in a certain output format (i.e. a RDF notation)

Parameters:
inputFormat - the name of the input format, as it is known to Krextor (an XSLT file in the extract/ directory)
outputFormat - the name of the output format, as it is known to Krextor (an XSLT file in the output/ directory)
Returns:
a XOM representation of an XSLT stylesheet that bundles together the desired extraction and output modules of Krextor â€“ a ready-to-use stylesheet as bundled with Krextor, or one that is generated on the fly using generateStylesheet(String, String)

extract

public Document extract(String inputFormat,
                        String outputFormat,
                        Document inputDocument)
                 throws XSLException
Extracts RDF from an input document (XML) into an output document in an XML-based RDF notation supported by Krextor (e.g. RXR or RDF/XML)

Parameters:
inputFormat - the name of the input format, as it is known to Krextor (an XSLT file in the extract/ directory)
outputFormat - the name of the output format, as it is known to Krextor (an XSLT file in the output/ directory)
inputDocument - the input XML document
Returns:
the output, as a XOM XML document
Throws:
XSLException

extract

public void extract(String inputFormat,
                    Document inputDocument,
                    TripleAdder callback)
             throws KrextorException
Extract RDF from an input XML document in a given input format and notify a callback for every RDF triple extracted

Parameters:
inputFormat - the name of the input format, as it is known to Krextor (an XSLT file in the extract/ directory)
inputDocument - the input XML document
callback - a callback object that is notified for every RDF triple extacted
Throws:
KrextorException
